content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Multi-player features for Starhawk will be terminated and no longer be available after June 30th, 2018. The single-player campaign and any other offline content will continue to be playable.

Explore the new frontier in Starhawk!

From the creators of Warhawk comes this frenetic third person shooter adventure that allows you to command the combat by using the innovative Build & Battle system. Call down a vast arsenal of vehicles, weapons and fortifications to turn the tide of the battle in a full Single Player campaign, competitive Multiplayer mode, and 1-4 player Co-Op mode.
Key Features:
• Intense Air, Ground, and Vehicular Combat: Engage in action-packed run and gun game play and pilot land or air vehicles for an incredible range of combat.
• New Build & Battle System: Change the battlefield instantly and call down a variety of equipment, vehicles and fortifications
• Full Single Player Campaign: Hired gun Emmett Graves must count on an arsenal of weapons and a little luck to stop a merciless Outcast horde from destroying his home town, and bring an outlaw to justice
• Frenetic 32 Multiplayer Battles: Engage online opponents in vast battlefields across unique worlds. Personalize your experience with player upgrades, skills, and customizable skins for characters and vehicles
• Offline and Online Co-op Modes: Team up online or on split-screen to defend your claim against waves of enemies in 1-4 player Co-Op Mode



Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

© 2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. 'Starhawk' is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
